Visual Cryptography Package v1.0

Package visualcryptography

Class Summary
AboutAction Display information about the module.
AboutPanel AboutPanel - It initialize the about panel.
ChangeLookAndFeelAction ChangeLookAndFeelAction - Look and Feel Class The lazy of doing things instead of defining it to actionPerformed This takes some of my time really.
CloseAction CloseAction Class Closing the file, updates the screen to null or white.
CloseAllAction CloseAllAction Closes all the open file in an instant.
CoalesceAction CoalesceAction class is responsible in making the coalesce image from the n shares specified this action removes the noise.
CoalesceWithNoiseAction CoalesceAction class is responsible in making the coalesce image from the n shares specified.
EncryptAction EncryptAction class the class responsible on choosing the vcs and write method of shares it also changes the draw panel to the first share of the encrypted image.
ExitAction ExitAction Class for Exit, when exit is chosen from the menu item.
HelpAction HelpAction Class - It sends out the help panel if there is???.
OkAction OkAction Class, when ok is push from the about panel.
OpenAction OpenAction, it then calls the paint method from the ImageCanvas and updates the screen.
SaveAction SaveAction class is responsible in saving the image on the drawing board to an external file specified in the JFileChooser.
TabListener Tablistener class is called when you navigate from one tab to another.
VCCloser Shutdown the application check if there is an open image.
VisualCryptography This is the base class of the application that implements VisualCryptography.

Submit a bug or feature at laizzez_faire07(@)yahoo.com. Visual Cryptography is an implementation of the newly discovered and developed visual encryption algorithm by Naor and Shamir at the Eurocrypt 1994. Copyright 2005 University of the Philippines, Los Ba±os, Laguna. All rights reserved.
